title: Understanding Data Inventory Architecture
text: A data inventory architecture should be flexible and comprehensive. It should allow for easy addition of new metadata and support the organization of personal data.

title: Exploring Data Sources
text: The architecture should be capable of crawling through various known data stores to gather information efficiently.

title: Discovering Unstructured Data
text: An effective data inventory architecture should be able to discover unstructured datasets and make them available for tagging and analysis.

title: Comprehensive Solution
text: Considering all the capabilities needed, which option best describes a complete data inventory architecture?
choices: provide extensibility to add new metadata and support the categorization of personal data
discover other datasets (especially unstructured data) and make them available for tagging
